tool_description: Download tracks, albums and playlists from Spotify! The best and most reliable Spotify Downloader API on RapidAPI!
name: Spotify Downloader
title: Spotify Downloader

api_list.name: Track List - Album
Track List - Playlist
Metadata - Album
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-downloader1.p.rapidapi.com/metadata/album/6lggWd5q9Rh66OkDE1eNDr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-downloader1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-downloader1.p.rapidapi.com/metadata/album/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-downloader1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
